name: js-test
description: Exercise/exam software for evaluating JavaScript students' progress

scripts.create: echo backing up to exam-data-backup-$(date +%s)...; mv exam-data exam-data-backup-$(date +%s); mkdir exam-data; cp sample-data/*.* exam-data; echo done! now, you can npm run start
scripts.deploy-firebase: echo "don't forget to rebuild and commit first!" && firebase use default && firebase deploy; # may not scale over 20 simultaneous connections
scripts.deploy-heroku: echo "don't forget to commit first!" && heroku git:remote -a js-part-2 && git push heroku `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`:master

author: Adrien Joly <adrien.joly@gmail.com>
